title: Low FPS on League.
body:
I used to get 60 fps. 3 or 4 days ago I did actually.

Now I only get in the low to mid 20s. Not sure what happened.

Restarting doesn't work nor does setting my laptop battery to High Performance.

replies.body: There might be a driver update you might have missed after some of the recent updates. Make sure to double check those, and be sure to run through the rest of the steps in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) and let me know if that's able to smooth out those frames for ya!
